metadata.title: CVE-2021-32918 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Prosody before 0.11.9. Default settings aresusceptible to remote unauthenticated denial-of-service (DoS) attacks viamemory exhaustion when running under Lua 5.2 or Lua 5.3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32918` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

prosody - 0.12.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: prosody package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.12.1-1').
